reviews.review:
我永远喜欢GlaDOS.jpg

惠特尼你TM个大坑B，自己脑残还要坑我一把

超级好玩的解谜，每个关卡都有一些独特的设计，重复的部分很少

卡关时灵感乍现一发过关爽的不行，撸*还没过关有意思，我超爱过关的

回头过来会佩服制作者的绝妙设计，绝对不会有强行想要你卡关的设计，
一切过关要素都在出人意料而又情理之中的地方，可以说是站在解谜游戏的顶峰了

剧情和关卡设计同样精彩，V社尿性，
故事推进明线挖坑，吃瓜玩家一脸萌币，
场景和对话暗线填坑，令人折服的世界观和每个人（或机器）跌宕起伏的故事

GlaDOS怕不是个傲娇

6块钱都不买，你对得起傲娇GlaDOS吗！？

另：希望孙子能把第三部烧给我
                                                         此处应有悲伤的BGM
Fighting The Natural Law
Very good game if u are into brainstorming game. Highly reccomend it to play with ur friends as it help to improve ur chemistry with ur friends
最近打通关了，只能说是神作，或者是对人性的思考
这款游戏很让人沉迷，在单人模式之后如果和好基友一起玩会感觉更有趣。单人模式实际上感觉更倾向于是新手教程。会场推荐，值得购买。
Es de lo mejor de steam y valve, mi calificacion es 10 de 10, es una obra de arte.

Mientras me alimento con mis snaks favoritos y un refresco, termino por jugar este titulo para finalizar bien el día.
Altamente recomendado!.

If you love puzzle games, buy this game, if you're not a puzzle-game-every-level kinda person don't get this game. After being pressed by friends for ages to get this game as it was "amazing" and "so funny"... and me constantly saying "it just looks like a puzzle game to me", I ended up buying it on sale, aaaaaand that was pretty much the sum of it, 50 or 60 levels of puzzle after puzzle with a vague humor thrown in. Not worth it, I wouldn't buy this game even on sale as I'm not into puzzle-all-the-time games. There are plenty of positive reviews for this game, I encourage you to read their reviews as well, try not to hate this review fan-boys, just an opinion from the perspective of someone who's not into doing puzzle after puzzle games.
Portal 1 was good? This is fantastic. They took it to a whole new level with new features and characters. If anything, the co-op levels are great entertainment.

I played both Portal games for the first time this year, and I finally get why they’re held in such high regard. It’s not shooting portals, or Glados singing in the credits, or 2011 memes. It’s about building an entire world around what is essentially a girl doing science experiments with a robot. But I will admit that, looking back, Portal 1 felt like an extended tech demo to me. Right when I thought it was getting good, it was over.

Portal 2, on the other hand, is much more unique and fleshed-out. You got Wheatly and Cave Johnson coming in as the most memorable, well-acted characters in forever, you got that dry, sarcastic humor that Valve is famous for, and you got the Enrichment Center chapter which is still my favorite part of both Portal games, period. It’s a classic for good reason.

[b]5/5[/b]

Öncelikle selamlar dostlarım :)
İki oyunuda oynadım ve hala zevk alarak oynuyorum kayıtlarda bi 15 saat civarı oynanma var ama bunun 2-3 katı kadarda ofline olarak oynamışımdır :)
Öncelikle oyunun + larını söylemek istiyorum 
+Şimdiye kadar oynadığım single olsun multi olsun beğendiğim oyunlardan bir tanesi.
+Mapler ne zor nede kolay orta düzeyde diyebiliriz.
+Oyunun grafikleri olsun oynanışı olsun hepsi hoş ve güzeller
Şimdi sıra - lerinde
-Oyunun birden fazla sonu olması çok daha güzel olabilirdi oyuna ayrı bir güzellik katacağını düşünüyorum.(belkide vardır ve ben bilmiyorumdur eğer varsa özür diliyorum kafanızı karıştırmak istemem)
-Oyun kolu bağlamayı denedim ama ne yazıkki beceremedim ama eğer yapabilseydim çok daha eğlenebilirdim.

Oyunun pek kötü yanını görmedim zevkle oynadığım bir seri ve Şiddetle tavsiye ederim :)
Ayrıca serinin 2. oyununda birde arkadaşınız varsa tadından yenmez :D
Yoksada otamatik olarak internet üzerinden biriyle eşleşmeniz mümkün :)

İncelememin sonuna gelmiş bulunuyorum :=)
İyi oyunlar dilerim dostlarım :)

WOW, this game was so much fun to play. The humor in it, the wonderfull mechanics and core gameplay. The story was much longer than Portal 1 but was very deep and brought you through the stages of what is Aperture Science. It shows how power corrupts and that sometimes the simple answer is the best answer. It was a thrill and some of the scenes were so cool just seeing it unfold and watch some of the cutscenes was amazing.

Graphics: Good graphics better than the first, not quite par with newer games running on unity or anything other than source, but nonetheless a good looking game.

Sound: As good or better than the first, again a joy to listen to and a quintessential part of the game.

Overall the game was wonderful, fun, good story, and great puzzles. Lots of fun, worth the  money, and left me wanting more Portal.
